column4: man, should I not be using Ubuntu 7.04?  I was using 6.10, 6.04 warty etc.... and never had the thing lock up on this machine.  Now, I install 7.04 and it keeps locking up on me :(
I wiped and did a complete re-install too
Are there any others having problems with Fiesty?
I guarantee you somebody has some problem with Feisty.
